text: D.825 is a north-to-south oriented state road () in southern Turkey. The long road starts at the junction to D.815 in Kayseri Province, runs through the provinces Kahramanmaraş, Gaziantep, Hatay and ends at Yayladağı Border Crossing to Syria in Hatay Province. ==Itinerary== In the table below, the locations on the route are shown: {| class="wikitable" |- !Province !Location !Distance from previous location (km) !Distance from North end (km) !Distance from South end (km) |-align=right |align=left |Kayseri ||align=left |D.815 Jct. ||0 ||0 ||334 |-align=right |align=left |Kayseri Kahramanmaraş ||align=left |Province border ||3 ||3 ||331 |-align=right |align=left rowspan=4 |Kahramanmaraş ||align=left |Göksun, D.330 Jct. ||26 ||29 ||305 |-align=right |align=left |Menzelet Dam ||48 ||77 ||257 |-align=right |align=left |Kahramanmaraş, D.835 Jct. || 41 ||118 ||216 |-align=right |align=left |Türkoğlu, D.360 Jct. || 23 ||141 ||193 |-align=right |align=left |Kahramanmaraş Gaziantep ||align=left |Province border ||17 ||158 ||176 |-align=right |align=left rowspan=4 |Gaziantep ||align=left |Motorway O.52 Jct., D.400 Jct. ||8 ||166 ||168 |-align=right |align=left |Nurdağı ||2 ||168 ||166 |-align=right |align=left |Fevzipaşa ||11 ||179 ||155 |-align=right |align=left |Islahiye ||10 ||189 ||145 |-align=right |align=left |Gaziantep Hatay ||align=left |Province border ||18 ||207 ||127 |-align=right |align=left rowspan=8 |Hatay ||align=left |D.410 Jct. ||2 ||209 ||125 |-align=right |align=left |Hassa ||7 ||216 ||118 |-align=right |align=left |Kırıkhan, E 98 Jct. ||37 ||253 ||81 |-align=right |align=left |Serinyol ||23 ||276 ||58 |-align=right |align=left |Hatay, D.420 Jct. ||14 ||290 ||44 |-align=right |align=left |Harbiye ||6 ||296 ||38 |-align=right |align=left |Yayladağı ||33 ||329 ||5 |-align=right |align=left |Yayladağı Border Crossing (to Syria) E 91 ||5 ||334 ||0 |} ==References== 825 Category:Transport in Kayseri Province Category:Transport in Kahramanmaraş Province Category:Transport in Gaziantep Province Category:Transport in Hatay Province
